nodes.text: Rockmites were small, six-legged creatures that lived on Tatooine and Rori and swarmed on banthas.

After the Battle of Yavin, Animal Control officer Entha Kandela tasked a spacer to eliminate rockmites around Mos Eisley to collect their egg sacks in order to manufacture artificial scent to drive the nesting mother mites further away from the city.
Rockmites appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
